summary: This API provides an open interface for partner users to create DG orders
description: This API provides an open interface for partner users to create DG orders

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/digital/service/createorder')
request.add_api_parameter("miniToken", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("miniappId", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("paymentRequestId", "888888")
request.add_api_parameter("extendInfo", "{\"123\":\"123\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("signature", "hgfjpodmnvlirer")
request.add_api_parameter("value", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("currency", "PHP")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/digital/service/createorder')
request.add_api_param('miniToken', '123456')
request.add_api_param('miniappId', '123456')
request.add_api_param('paymentRequestId', '888888')
request.add_api_param('extendInfo', '{\"123\":\"123\"}')
request.add_api_param('signature', 'hgfjpodmnvlirer')
request.add_api_param('value', '100')
request.add_api_param('currency', 'PHP')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
